title: Ring Fenced
description: A story about power, control and obsessionOne man, five lives, ring-fenced and separated,Bennie, loving husband and father,Benjie, youngest son of orthodox Jewish parents,Ben, successful corporate banker,Benjamin, millionaire author and publisher of pornographyand Jamie, part-time lover of a beautiful musician.Relying on his Blackberry to keep all his personae separate, his life is perfect.But what if holes begin to appear in the divisions?When a sequence of events throws his life into chaos, his separate words collide with explosive consequences.
author: Zach Abrams
